The rush of adrenaline, the satisfaction of outsmarting my marks, the pride of getting away with the prize – it's exhilarating, to say the least.

As for a suitable challenge, I'd love to take on a high-stakes heist, something that would put my skills to the test and showcase my expertise to the world.
